main.name: Digdarshan Kunwar
main.description: I am a Computer Science major student at Jacobs University Bremen, passively looking for internship/job opportunities in Software and Web Development. I want to further develop my creative skills, technological expertise & innovative thoughts.
main.bio: I am a Front End developer with industry experience building websites and web applications. I specialize in JavaScript and have semi-professional experience working with Python and React. I also have experience working with Vue, Wordpress and Express.Js.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to contact me using the social media links or the form below. I really look forward to hearing from you !

testimonials.message: He was one of the company builders at BES Nepal.
testimonials.text: We've worked together on every type of project - including major marketing initiatives,graphic identity programs, logo and letterhead designs, web sites, brochures, signage programs,invitations, e-communications, online/print newsletters, Power-Point presentations, Merchandisedesign, and more.

testimonials.message: He played a key role in planning, creating and managing visual content for our clients.
testimonials.text: His ability to priorities tasks, as well as effectively implement constructive feedback in his work speaks to his organizational skills, willingness to learn, and leadership potential.
